rows.label: bf10480100_0005
rows.name:
I entrust the rest to you...
my children...

rows.label: bf10480100_0020_h
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]I'm back.

rows.label: bf10480100_0020_s
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]I'm back.

rows.label: bf10480100_0030_h
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Nice to meet you.

rows.label: bf10480100_0030_s
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Nice to meet you.

rows.label: bf10480100_0040
rows.name: And thus, the boy met the girl.

rows.label: bf10480100_0050
rows.name:

rows.label: bf10480100_0061
rows.name: Very end of eternity

rows.label: bf10480100_0062
rows.name: The final day has come to an end, it’s gone for good

rows.label: bf10480100_0063
rows.name: I would then slowly close my eyes

rows.label: bf10480100_0064
rows.name: And be cuddled by the shining memory piece

rows.label: bf10480100_0065
rows.name:
[ML:undisp ] 
I will trace back all the memories with you

rows.label: bf10480100_0066
rows.name: That’s the only wish I have

rows.label: bf10480100_0067
rows.name: The last day with you

rows.label: bf10480100_0094
rows.name: was truly magical

rows.label: bf10480100_0068
rows.name: The frozen time began to flow

rows.label: bf10480100_0069
rows.name: At last the longest night has gone and brought in light

rows.label: bf10480100_0070
rows.name: I felt myself melt in the morning light

rows.label: bf10480100_0071
rows.name: The final grain of sand has dropped

rows.label: bf10480100_0072
rows.name:
[ML:undisp ] 
I will slowly so quietly fall into sleep

rows.label: bf10480100_0073
rows.name: I see you gently fade away

rows.label: bf10480100_0074
rows.name: Your silhouette has gone the other side of the mist

rows.label: bf10480100_0075
rows.name: And all the memories

rows.label: bf10480100_0095
rows.name: with no sound so quiet

rows.label: bf10480100_0076
rows.name: Just like in slow motion it moves so slowly

rows.label: bf10480100_0077
rows.name: And so the last day with you

rows.label: bf10480100_0096
rows.name: was truly magical

rows.label: bf10480100_0078
rows.name: The frozen time began to flow

rows.label: bf10480100_0079
rows.name: At last the longest night has gone and brought in light

rows.label: bf10480100_0080
rows.name: I felt myself melt in the morning light

rows.label: bf10480100_0081
rows.name: You have gifted many things to me

rows.label: bf10480100_0082
rows.name: (But I) wonder if I could’ve done the same for you

rows.label: bf10480100_0083
rows.name: If you would let me, I will give back a handful

rows.label: bf10480100_0084
rows.name: If that could put a little smile on your face

rows.label: bf10480100_0085
rows.name: Can I ask you, God? Despite all this…

rows.label: bf10480100_0086
rows.name:
I wonder if the sand-glass could
somehow take back the time?

rows.label: bf10480100_0087
rows.name: One last time is all I ask from you

rows.label: bf10480100_0088
rows.name: Can you please spare me a time

rows.label: bf10480100_0092
rows.name: with a one man I loved?

rows.label: bf10480100_0089
rows.name: I wouldn’t care how and where (you could) it should be

rows.label: bf10480100_0090
rows.name: But I need one last time I want to tell you,

rows.label: bf10480100_0091
rows.name: how I feel inside for you

rows.label: bf10480100_0093
rows.name: I want you to know…
